front.title: YANG Data Model for Preferred Path Routing

abstract.t: This document defines YANG data modules for preferred path routing ([I-D.chunduri-lsr-isis-preferred-path-routing], [I-D.chunduri-lsr-ospf-preferred-path-routing]) configuration and operation. The YANG modules are intended to be used on network elements to manage the configurations and operations of preferred path routing.
